row.value: Coluna de Vínculo para Tabelas com múltiplos Pais

value.original: The Link Column indicates which column is the primary key for those situations where there is more than one parent. Only define it, if the table has more than one parent column (e.g. AD_User_Roles).

row.value: A coluna de vínculo indica qual coluna é a chave primária para as situações onde existe mais de um pai (ascendente). Definir somente se a tabela tem mais de uma coluna pai (ascendente). Ex. AD_User_Roles.

value.original: Language for this Business Partner if Multi-Language enabled

row.value: Idioma para este Parceiro de Negócios se Multi-Idiomas estiver habilitado

value.original: The Language identifies the language to use for display and formatting documents. It requires, that on Client level, Multi-Lingual documents are selected and that you have created/loaded the language.

row.value: O Idioma identifica o idioma a ser utilizado para visualização e formatação de documentos. É necessário que no nível de Empresa estejam selecionados documentos Multi-Idiomas e que você tenha criado e carregado o idioma.
Nó de Workflow, passo ou processo

value.original: The Workflow Node indicates a unique step or process in a Workflow.

row.value: O Nó do Workflow indica um único passo ou processo em um Workflow.

value.original: Tax Amount for Credit Card transaction

row.value: Montante de Taxas para transação de Cartão de Crédito

value.original: The Tax Amount displays the total tax amount. The tax amount is only used for credit card processing.

row.value: O "Valor do Imposto" mostra o valor total dos impostos. O Montante de Taxas só é usado para processamento de cartões de crédito.

value.original: The Accounting Date indicates the date to be used on the General Ledger account entries generated from this document. It is also used for any currency conversion. The Accounting Date on Bank/Cash Statement Line is used for currency conversion and reporting purposes, the accounting is posted using the header date account.

row.value: O campo indica a data a ser usada para fins de conversão de moeda. Os registros contábeis para o Livro Razão são lançados com a data contábil da aba Extrato Bancário/Caixa.

value.original: Identifies a Business Partner (Sales Rep) receiving the Commission

row.value: Identifica um Parceiro de Negócios (Representante de Vendas) a receber comissões

value.original: The Business Partner should be a vendor and may be a Sales Representative

row.value: O Parceiro de Negócios deve ser um Representante de Vendas.

value.original: The Acknowledged checkbox indicates if this notice does not need to be retained.

row.value: A caixa de verificação Reconhecido indica se este alerta não precisa ser retido.

value.original: Column which controls all tabs in the workbench

row.value: Coluna que controla todas as abas da Bancada de Trabalho

value.original: Name your iDempiere System installation, e.g. Joe Block, Inc.

row.value: Dê um nome à sua instalação de Sistema Adempiere, por exemplo Soliton Ltda.

value.original: The name if the system to differentiate support contracts

row.value: É o nome para o sistema diferenciar contratos de suporte

value.original: The values of the actual Product Attributes. Product Instance attributes are defined in the actual transactions.

row.value: São os valores dos Atributos de Produtos reais. Atributos de Instância de Produto são definidos nas transações reais.

value.original: Document sequence number of the document

row.value: Documenta o número seqüencial dos documentos

value.original:
The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>".
If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).

row.value:
O número do documento é usualmente gerado automaticamente pelo sistema e determinado pelo tipo de documento. Se o documento não for salvo, o número preliminar é mostrado em "<>".
Se o tipo do seu documento não tiver uma seqüência de documentação automática definida, o campo estará vazio ao criar um novo documento. Isto é para documentos que usualmente tem um número externo (como fatura do fornecedor). Se você deixar o campo vazio, o sistema vai gerar um número de documento por você. A seqüência de documento usada por este número de recuperação é definida na janela "Gerenciamento de Seqüência" com o nome "DocumentNo_<TableName>", onde TableName é o nome real da tabela (ex: C_Order).
Representante da Empresa/Organização (Vendedor, Comprador ou Responsável)

value.original: The Sales Representative indicates the Sales Rep for this Region. Any Sales Rep must be a valid internal user.

row.value: Qualquer usuário interno válido pode ser selecionado como Representante da Empresa/Organização.
Tipo de cálculo para o esquema

value.original: Type of procedure used to calculate the trade schema percentage

row.value: Tipo de procedimento usado para calcular a porcentagem do esquema

value.original: Overwrite the account segment Project with the value specified

row.value: Sobrescrever o segmento contábil do Projeto com o valor especificado

value.original: If not overwritten, the value of the original account combination is used. If selected, but not specified, the segment is set to null.

row.value: Se não for sobre-escrito, o valor da combinação de conta original será utilizado. Se selecionado, mas não especificado, o segmento é ajustado para nulo.

value.original:
You can define virtual columns (not stored in the database). If defined, the Column name is the synonym of the SQL expression defined here. The SQL expression must be valid.
Example: "Updated-Created" would list the age of the entry in days.
It is not recommended to add complex queries in virtual columns as the impact on the database performance can be too expensive.
However, you can use the prefix @SQLFIND= for virtual columns that can be used for queries and reports, they have less impact on the database, but as a field they don't show values.
Additionally, the prefix @SQL= allows to define a virtual UI column, this is calculated on the fly and can use context variables in the query, virtual UI columns are shown in grid just on the current row, they are not searchable, and not shown in reports.

row.value:
You can define virtual columns (not stored in the database). If defined, the Column name is the synonym of the SQL expression defined here. The SQL expression must be valid.
Example: "Updated-Created" would list the age of the entry in days.
It is not recommended to add complex queries in virtual columns as the impact on the database performance can be too expensive.
However, you can use the prefix @SQLFIND= for virtual columns that can be used for queries and reports, they have less impact on the database, but as a field they don't show values.
Additionally, the prefix @SQL= allows to define a virtual UI column, this is calculated on the fly and can use context variables in the query, virtual UI columns are shown in grid just on the current row, they are not searchable, and not shown in reports.

value.original: The values of the actual Product Attributes. Product Instance attributes are defined in the actual transactions.

row.value: São os valores dos Atributos de Produtos reais. Atributos de Instância de Produto são definidos nas transações reais.

value.original:
The Validation Code displays the date, time and message of the error.
You can add advanced SQL queries to your searches by filling this field with @SQL=[WHERE CLAUSE]. Do not include the WHERE statement and use Fully qualified SQL statements. F.e:
@SQL=C_Order.isActive='Y' AND SalesRep_ID=@AD_User_ID@
will filter orders by active and where the sales representative is the current user.

row.value:
The Validation Code displays the date, time and message of the error.
You can add advanced SQL queries to your searches by filling this field with @SQL=[WHERE CLAUSE]. Do not include the WHERE statement and use Fully qualified SQL statements. F.e:
@SQL=C_Order.isActive='Y' AND SalesRep_ID=@AD_User_ID@
will filter orders by active and where the sales representative is the current user.

value.original: A manufacturing resource is a place where a product will be made.

value.original: The name BOM/Formula that you introduce in this window will be considered the default BOM to produce the product in this Organization-Plant-Warehouse. If you do not fill this field the default BOM & Formula for the entity will be the BOM/Formula which has the same name as the product.

row.value: The name BOM/Formula that you introduce in this window will be considered the default BOM to produce the product in this Organization-Plant-Warehouse. If you do not fill this field the default BOM & Formula for the entity will be the BOM/Formula which has the same name as the product.

value.original:
The Workflow field identifies a unique Workflow in the system.
The Workflow you introduce in this window will be considered the default Workflow to produce the product in this Organization-Plant-Warehouse. If you do not fill this field the defaul Workflow for the entity will be the Workflow with the same name as the product.

row.value:
The Workflow field identifies a unique Workflow in the system.
The Workflow you introduce in this window will be considered the default Workflow to produce the product in this Organization-Plant-Warehouse. If you do not fill this field the defaul Workflow for the entity will be the Workflow with the same name as the product.

value.original: Promised days between order and delivery

row.value: Promised days between order and delivery

value.original:
The Promised Delivery Time indicates the number of days between the order date and the date that delivery was promised.
You must enter the average number of days to receive the product in the warehouse since you approve the requisition or manufacturing order until you receive the material in the warehouse . If the product is bought you must register the calendar days required since you make the PO until you receive the material in the warehouse. If the product is manufactured in your plant you must register the number of working days since you release the MO until you receive the material in the warehouse.

row.value:
The Promised Delivery Time indicates the number of days between the order date and the date that delivery was promised.
You must enter the average number of days to receive the product in the warehouse since you approve the requisition or manufacturing order until you receive the material in the warehouse . If the product is bought you must register the calendar days required since you make the PO until you receive the material in the warehouse. If the product is manufactured in your plant you must register the number of working days since you release the MO until you receive the material in the warehouse.

value.original:
Amount of time the performer of the activity needs to perform the task in Duration Unit
In the field Working Time you enter the accumulated time (using the Promising Delivery Time) in the critical path of the BOM for this product. It is the required time to produce the product as if you would not have any component on hand.

row.value:
Amount of time the performer of the activity needs to perform the task in Duration Unit
In the field Working Time you enter the accumulated time (using the Promising Delivery Time) in the critical path of the BOM for this product. It is the required time to produce the product as if you would not have any component on hand.

value.original: Indicates the Date an item was ordered. Date Ordered is the date when the order was generated. If the MO is created manually the default date ordered is the system date. If the MO was generated by MRP the default date ordered is the day of the MRP process.

row.value: Indicates the Date an item was ordered. Date Ordered is the date when the order was generated. If the MO is created manually the default date ordered is the system date. If the MO was generated by MRP the default date ordered is the day of the MRP process.

value.original: The Date Promised indicates the date, if any, that an Order was promised for. Date Promised Is the date we commit to give the order to the warehouse. If the MO is created manually the default date promised is the system date. If the MO was generated by MRP this date is filled automatically using its algorithm calculation.

row.value: The Date Promised indicates the date, if any, that an Order was promised for. Date Promised Is the date we commit to give the order to the warehouse. If the MO is created manually the default date promised is the system date. If the MO was generated by MRP this date is filled automatically using its algorithm calculation.

value.original:
The Validation Code displays the date, time and message of the error.
You can add advanced SQL queries to your searches by filling this field with @SQL=[WHERE CLAUSE]. Do not include the WHERE statement and use Fully qualified SQL statements. F.e:
@SQL=C_Order.isActive='Y' AND SalesRep_ID=@AD_User_ID@
will filter orders by active and where the sales representative is the current user.

row.value:
The Validation Code displays the date, time and message of the error.
You can add advanced SQL queries to your searches by filling this field with @SQL=[WHERE CLAUSE]. Do not include the WHERE statement and use Fully qualified SQL statements. F.e:
@SQL=C_Order.isActive='Y' AND SalesRep_ID=@AD_User_ID@
will filter orders by active and where the sales representative is the current user.

value.original: The Grand Total displays the total amount including Tax and Freight in document currency
The Fee Amount indicates the charge amount on a dunning letter for overdue invoices. This field will only display if the charge fee checkbox has been selected.

value.original: Indicates the amount this payment is for. The payment amount can be for single or multiple invoices or a partial payment for an invoice.

row.value: Indica o valor deste pagamento. O "Valor do Pagamento" pode ser para uma única ou para múltiplas faturas ou ainda um pagamento parcial de uma fatura.

value.original: Amount available for allocation for this document

row.value: Valor efetivo a ser creditado referente ao título, expresso em moeda corrente.

value.original: Document sequence number of the document

row.value: Documenta o número seqüencial da NF-e

value.original:
The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>".
If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).

row.value:
O número do documento é usualmente gerado automaticamente pelo sistema e determinado pelo tipo de documento. Se o documento não for salvo, o número preliminar é mostrado em "<>".
Se o tipo do seu documento não tiver uma seqüência de documentação automática definida, o campo estará vazio ao criar um novo documento. Isto é para documentos que usualmente tem um número externo (como fatura do fornecedor). Se você deixar o campo vazio, o sistema vai gerar um número de documento por você. A seqüência de documento usada por este número de recuperação é definida na janela "Gerenciamento de Seqüência" com o nome "DocumentNo_<TableName>", onde TableName é o nome real da tabela (ex: C_Order).

value.original: The Document Date indicates the date the document was generated. It may or may not be the same as the accounting date.
Date when the product was delivered
The Charge Amount indicates the amount for an additional charge.
Document sequence number of the document

The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>".
If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).
The Grand Total displays the total amount including Tax and Freight in document currency
Indicates the net amount for this invoice. It does not include shipping or any additional charges.
Document sequence number of the document

The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>".
If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).
Name of the column in the database
The Column Name indicates the name of a column on a table as defined in the database.
The Note field allows for optional entry of user defined information regarding this record
Document sequence number of the document

The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>".
If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).

Indicates the protocol of the sending process to Sefaz

row.value: Indica o número do protocolo do processamento do lote pela Sefaz

value.original: Indicates the protocol of the sending process to Sefaz

row.value: Indica o número do protocolo do processamento do lote pela Sefaz

value.original: The Document Date indicates the date the document was generated. It may or may not be the same as the accounting date.

row.value: A "Data de Emissão" indica a data em que o documento foi emitido. Ela pode ser ou não a mesma da data contábil.

value.original: The Grand Total displays the total amount including Tax and Freight in document currency
A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson

row.value: Pessoa física ou jurídica indicada no título como responsável pelo pagamento.

value.original: Identifies the (ship to) address for this Business Partner
The Partner address indicates the location of a Business Partner

row.value: A localização (endereço de pagamento a terceiros e cobrança) do sacado

value.original: The Grand Total displays the total amount including Tax and Freight in document currency
The Fee Amount indicates the charge amount on a dunning letter for overdue invoices. This field will only display if the charge fee checkbox has been selected.

row.value: Indica o valor da tarifa cobrada pelo serviço prestado pelo Banco Cedente referente ao título, expresso em moeda corrente.

value.original: The Interest Amount indicates any interest charged or received on a Bank Statement.

row.value: Indica o valor dos acréscimos efetuados no título de cobrança, expresso em moeda corrente.

value.original: Indicates the amount this payment is for. The payment amount can be for single or multiple invoices or a partial payment for an invoice.

row.value: Indica o valor deste pagamento. O "Valor do Pagamento" pode ser para uma única ou para múltiplas faturas ou ainda um pagamento parcial de uma fatura.

value.original: Amount available for allocation for this document

row.value: Valor efetivo a ser creditado referente ao título, expresso em moeda corrente.
